The Highest Development of Mental Powers.--It is right for the youth to feel that they must reach the highest 

188 

development of their mental powers. We would not restrict the education to which God has set no limit. But our attainments avail nothing if not put to use for the honor of God and the good of humanity. It is not well to crowd the mind with studies that require intense application but that are not brought into use in practical life.--MH 449, 450 (1905).
